jobDescription: Analytic Data Scientist Creates solutions for the business by recommending ways to bring data to life to solve business problems. We are a shared service for the entire company and operate in several key areas: Business Analytics: -Using advanced modeling and simulation techniques to optimize the performance of our business units. -Forecasting, Attribution modeling, Text mining, Spatial analytics, and other advanced techniques are applied to solve real-world business problems.Marketing Analytics: -Using advanced modeling to understand consumer behavior to both enhance customer experiences as well as improve our marketing program execution and design. -Utilize formalized program evaluation methodology to determine marketing program effectiveness. Conduct customer level modeling to customize communication and marketing offers.
